content.title: Renal Salvage vs Nephrectomy Decision
content.description: Clinical decision-making framework for attempted revascularization versus nephrectomy in renal artery disease.

factors_favoring_salvage.function: Some residual function on nuclear scan

decision_points.solitary_kidney: Attempt salvage if any function preserved
decision_points.bilateral_atrophy: Consider bilateral nephrectomy with dialysis plan

content.clinical_pearl: Kidney size and cortical thickness predict recoverability; <10% function rarely recovers after revascularization
